attributes.action: ensure an individual can only become Prime Minister by a general election of the people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Precedent is often cited in support of not holding a general election when a Prime Minister leaves, usually citing the other party as an example.  All that proves is politicians wish to retain the decision making, regardless of affiliation.

Short of a crisis requiring an Acting Prime Minister NOBODY should be in charge of the democratic governance of the people without a general election.  This should not be side-stepped by a party election either.

As one leader resigns there should be an Acting Prime Minister until a general election is held within no more than 4 months.

Arguments that against this are transparent and designed only to retain power regardless of the wishes of the people.
